example.eg: The prior acts of violence occurred on the same street.
example.egtrans: 以前那次暴行也发生在同一条街上。

example.eg: Prior to the burglary, two men were seen hanging around outside the house.
example.egtrans: 盗窃发生之前，有人看见有两个人在房子外面闲晃。

example.eg: We went to the farmers' market prior to going to the pharmacy.
example.egtrans: 在去药房之前，我们去了一趟农场集市。

example.eg: The prior called his brothers to prayer in the abbey.
example.egtrans: 修道院院长叫他的弟兄们去修道院祈祷。

example.eg: I was unable to attend the birthday party due to a prior commitment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 事先承诺, 事先计划

example.eg: He went ahead and did it without any prior consultation with his colleagues.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 事先协商, 事前协议

example.eg: Sorry, I can't join you; I have a prior engagement.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 事先预约, 有约在先

example.eg: Prior to this, Jermaine had never mentioned the subject.
